name: Feature Request
about: Suggest a new feature or enhancement
title: '[Feature] '
labels: ['enhancement']
assignees: ''
---

## Feature Description

A clear and concise description of the feature you'd like to see implemented.

## Problem Statement

Describe the problem this feature would solve. For example:
- "I'm always frustrated when..."
- "It would be helpful if..."
- "Players would benefit from..."

## Proposed Solution

A clear and concise description of what you want to happen. Include:
- How the feature would work
- Expected user interface or interaction
- Any specific behavior or functionality

## Alternative Solutions

Describe any alternative solutions or features you've considered.

## Implementation Notes (Optional)

If you have thoughts on how this could be implemented technically, include them here:
- Affected systems or modules
- Potential approaches
- Technical considerations

## Benefits

Explain the benefits of this feature:
- Who would benefit from this feature?
- How would it improve the game or development experience?
- Does it align with AD&D 1E rules or roguelike conventions?

## Additional Context

Add any other context, mockups, or screenshots about the feature request here.

## Related Issues

List any related issues or PRs here (e.g., Related to #42, Depends on #43).
